options.content:
graph  LR  
  subgraph  h1  ["NODENAME1"]
  ip{{VLAN: 3911  -  IP: DATAPLANEIP1}}
  e(IFNAMEHOST1)
  end
  
  e(IFNAMEHOST1)  ----  sw1s1if[SWITCH2PORT1IF]

  subgraph  sw1  ["SNMP1NAME Switch"]
  subgraph  sw1s1  ["port"]
  sw1s1vlan{{VLAN:  SWITCH1PORT1VLAN}}
  sw1s1if[SWITCH1PORT1IF]
  end
  subgraph  sw1s2  ["port"]
  sw1s2vlan{{VLAN: SWITCH1PORT2VLAN}}
  sw1s2ifout[SWITCH1PORT1IF]
  end
  end

  subgraph  sw2  ["SNMP2NAME Switch"]
  subgraph  sw2s1  ["port"]
  sw2s1vlan{{VLAN: 3911}}
  sw2s1if[SWITCH2PORT1IF]
  end
  subgraph  sw2s2  ["port"]
  sw2s2vlan{{VLAN: SWITCH2PORT2VLAN}}
  sw2s2ifout[SWITCH2PORT2IF]
  end
  end
  
  sw1s2ifout[SWITCH1PORT2IF]  ----  sw2s1if[SWITCH2PORT1IF]
  sw2s2ifout[SWITCH2PORT2IF]  ----  e2(IFNAMEHOST2)
  
  subgraph  h2  ["NODENAME2"]
  ip2{{VLAN: 3911  -  IP: DATAPLANEIP2}}  
  e2(IFNAMEHOST2)
  end

```
node name: NODENAME1   if name: IFNAMEHOST1   DATAPLANEIP1   IPHOST1    Vlan: 3911
 ```

```
Switch: SNMP1NAME   port 1: SWITCH1PORT1IF   port 2: SWITCH1PORT2IF   switch IP: IPSWITCH1
```
